description: Coverings are "recommended" for post-primary pupils from today but some say they should be compulsory.
title: Coronavirus: Face coverings for teachers and students introduced
title_page: Coronavirus: Face coverings for teachers and students introduced - BBC News
maintext: "The news had broken that it was going to be mandatory, that it was a requirement for children to wear face masks in post-primary schools - when the guidance letter came in it was just recommending it," she said.
